Header: FCID questions Shashi Weerawansa for several hours
Content: Wife of former Minister Wimal Weerawansa, Shashi Weerawansa, appeared before the Police Financial Crimes Investigations Division (FCID) on the morning of  Thursday June 4. According to the Police Media Spokesperson ASP Ruwan Gunasekera, the wife of the former minister was summoned to record a statement over assets which include several properties. The FCID’s questioning on Shashi Weerawansa went on for several hours – up to Thursday evening. Speaking on the matter, the Leader of the National Freedom Front and former Minister Wimal Weerawansa noted that the lands in question were purchased before he took the position of a  minister.
